channel.title: When people try to connect to my server the client won't load! 639
channel.description: When my friend tries to connect to my server all the client does is stop loading at 1% and stay there. we're both using the matrix 639 client. please help I'm pretty sure I portforwarded right. I portforwarded my computer IP and not my No-ip IP.

item.title: When people try to connect to my server the client won't load! 639
item.dc:creator: @kingcobra805 kingcobra805
item.description:
@kingcobra805 wrote:

Make sure your cache is in the right location and is compatible with the revision you are loading. If thats not the problem then id suggest uTorrent, just download it on the bottem right corner there is like a little box its like | | click in the middle disable broadband test, and then put in port 43594 or whatever port your running on and then test it, if this does not help idk what to tell ya tbh…

Best of luck.

Read full topic
item.source: When people try to connect to my server the client won't load! 639
